Modern Search Filter

What is that?

This is a modern site with a search filter that allows you to search and filter content in real time. Simply enter words or phrases in the search field to search for matching content on the site.

List of elements

Here is a list of elements that can be searched. If an element contains the search term, it is displayed; otherwise it is hidden.

  • Element 1
  • Element 2
  • Element 3
  • Element 4
  • Element 5

Further contents

Here is more content you can search through. Simply enter the word or phrase you are looking for in the search field to navigate to the relevant sections.

For example, you could search for "content" and go to this section to learn more about how to search and filter content on the site.
